com.advantech.bleeplib.utils

Interface BLEConnectListener


  • public interface BLEConnectListener
    BLEConnectListener is a callback listener which will returns the connection results after you register a listener using the following method.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Fabian Chung
    See Also:
    BLEUtil.addConnectListener(String, BLEConnectListener)

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • onConnectionStateChange

        void onConnectionStateChange(int result)
        BLE connection callback.
        Parameters:
        result - connection result. Please reference the following results.
        See Also:
        BluetoothProfile.STATE_DISCONNECTED, BluetoothProfile.STATE_CONNECTING, BluetoothProfile.STATE_CONNECTED, BluetoothProfile.STATE_DISCONNECTING

      • onConnectionTimeout

        void onConnectionTimeout(java.lang.String message)
        BLE connection timeout callback.
        Parameters:
        message - error message

      • onServicesDiscovered

        void onServicesDiscovered(int result)
        BLE service discovered callback.
        Parameters:
        result - if success, you will receive BluetoothGatt.GATT_SUCCESS

      • onFirmwareRead

        void onFirmwareRead(int result,
                    byte[] read)
        Firmware read callback.
        Parameters:
        result - if success, you will receive BluetoothGatt.GATT_SUCCESS
        read - read data

      • onLEDRead

        void onLEDRead(int result,
               byte[] read)
        LED read callback.
        Parameters:
        result - if success, you will receive BluetoothGatt.GATT_SUCCESS
        read - read data

      • onLEDWrite

        void onLEDWrite(int result,
                byte[] read)
        LED write callback.
        Parameters:
        result - if success, you will receive BluetoothGatt.GATT_SUCCESS
        read - read data

      • onImageWrite

        void onImageWrite(BLEImageWriteStatus status,
                  int progress,
                  java.lang.String message)
        Image write callback. You will receive the progress results when Android device generating the image and sending data to the EPD device.
        Parameters:
        status - image write status. Please see BLEImageWriteStatus for all status.
        progress - image write progress
        message - image write message

      • onImageRefresh

        void onImageRefresh(boolean isSuccess,
                    int page)
        Image refresh callback. You will receive this event when the EPD device has finished refreshing the image on its screen.
        Parameters:
        isSuccess - true if the EPD device refresh the image successfully; false otherwise
        page - refresh page number

      • onAlarmDetected

        void onAlarmDetected(boolean isWarning)
        Alarm triggered callback. You will receive this event when the EPD device is pressed on its alarm button.
        Parameters:
        isWarning - true if the alarm flag is raising; {#code false} otherwise
